page.title: 03LOCAL NEWS
page.content: Many clubs and societies exist in both villages, providing a choice of activities, as extracts from the Summer 1985 Parish magazine show. {Elham:}Christian Aid - Our thanks to all from both the Methodist and Parish Churches, who helped with this years collection, the sum of Â£196.15 was raised. Mothers Union - Members are reminded to keep collecting items for the fete "bathroom" stall. Plese send them to 8-11 Fourfield by Thursday 18th July. {Lyminge:}"I am a little anxious about the daffodils etc. for the Church decoration this Easter. Will anyone please bring flowers to the Church by 10am on Easter Saturday, also plenty of Forsythia." {Acrise:}Acrise Young Farmers' club are now busy preparing for their annual farming fayre on 26th May.
